main event: An observer sighted a high-speed spherical object with a reddish center and blue edges moving in a straight path at Window Rock, Arizona on 7 March 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as having a diameter of about three feet., It was observed moving at a speed of 200-300 miles per hour., The sighting lasted for about 30 to 60 seconds., The object left a slight trail and was bright enough to be seen in daylight., The observer viewed the object through the clear windshield of their car.
sighted object: a spherical object with a red center and blue edges
